admin/course-settings.title: Course Settings
admin/course-settings.description: Admin users can view and modify course configuration settings in the Course Config view. Here, the Course Readings list link can also be added and edited, which provides all users with a hyperlink to the Course Readings from the Dashboard.

admin/structure.title: Course Structure
admin/structure.description: From the Structure tab in Course Settings, the Admin can Add lessons, Edit the names of lessons and switch to Reorder mode where lessons can be dragged and dropped into other Modules.

intro.title: ðŸ‘‹ Welcome to Smart Storyboard
intro.description: The Smart Storyboard is a cloud based development tool which aims to replace word based documents as the primary means of capturing and developing learning material for online courses.

using-ssb/account.title: Account creation and management
using-ssb/account.description: You can access the Smart Storyboard on our Media Production GitHub hosted environment.

using-ssb/assessment.title: Assessments
using-ssb/assessment.description: To add an Assessment, you first need to an an Assessment Group. Each Group has a weighting which should total to 100% across all items.

using-ssb/media.title: Adding Media
using-ssb/media.description: This is for the LD/SME-focused documentation. For the Media Production and Course Build-oriented documentation on working with Media, this can be found in our internal Confluence page.

using-ssb/quizzes.title: Quizzes & Discussions
using-ssb/quizzes.description: Discussions and Quizzes are added through the Lesson view page:
